code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import AppBar from"@mui/material/AppBar";import Toolbar from"@mui/material/Toolbar";import Typography from"@mui/material/Typography";import{Wifi,WifiOff}from"@mui/icons-material";import{Tooltip,Box}from"@mui/material";import WelcomeName from"./WelcomeName";import SignInSignOutButton from"./SignInSignOutButton";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavBar=()=>{const[isOnline,setIsOnline]=useState(navigator.onLine);useEffect(()=>{const handleOnline=()=>setIsOnline(true);const handleOffline=()=>setIsOnline(false);window.addEventListener('online',handleOnline);window.addEventListener('offline',handleOffline);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('online',handleOnline);window.removeEventListener('offline',handleOffline);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{flexGrow:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{style:{flexGrow:1},children:"Baumgartner Fenster"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WelcomeName,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{mx:1},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:isOnline?"Online":"Offline",children:isOnline?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Wifi,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WifiOff,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignInSignOutButton,{})]})})});};export default NavBar;
